Body:
request_handler = RequestHandler('a', 'b', 'https://localhost', 'default', 
    10, 30)
req = Request(method='GET', url='https://example.url', headers={}, json={
    'a': 'b'})
with requests.Session() as sess:
    prep_req = sess.prepare_request(req)
    result = request_handler.format_request(prep_req)
    assert 'body:\n  {\n    "a": "b"\n  }' in result
